Q_BELL_TOWER_MYSTERY.title: The Bell Tower Mystery
Q_BELL_TOWER_MYSTERY.description: A strange resonance emanates from the center of campus. Legend says the bricks themselves hold memories. Go to the source of the sound to uncover the truth.

completion_reward.details: You have attuned yourself to the campus rhythm.

STEP_01_SEEK_THE_SOUND.description: The sound is loudest near the tall, brick spire. Navigate to the Bell Tower.

step_reward.details: You stand beneath the towering spire. The air vibrates with history.

STEP_02_DEFINE_THE_SOURCE.description: To truly understand the structure, you must name it with precision. It is not just a tower. It is a...

step_reward.details: Correct. A Campanile. A freestanding bell tower.
